title: Step up to superior condo living while enjoying this exceptional Sun .
description: Step up to superior condo living while enjoying this exceptional Sun Terrace Unit at Wildman Arms in the heart of Lansdowne . Wildman offers so many amenities at no additional fee! A Swimming Pool, Garden Plots, an Exercise Rom, Sharing Library & Meeting Room! This one bedroom units boasts newly enhanced Hardwood Floors and an updated Kitchen, with all newer appliances, a built-in Microwave and there is super new Lighting and new Heating elements throughout. Step in and enjoy the Delightful Open Dining Area with two Huge Walk in Storage Closets, the spacious very bright Living Room opens onto that very special Sun Porch. Enjoy the breakfast/study area on your way to the Kitchen. A full updated ceramic tile Bathroom is just across the hall from the spacious bright Bedroom. Move right in and enjoy, not a thing for you to do! Wildman Arms is just 2 blocks to all the super shopping, the Open Air Farmer's Market, the Train to 30th Street Station. Enjoy the very special small town events and atmosphere. Lansdowne is home to the award winning Lansdowne Symphony Orchestra, a great Folk Club, special arts events throughout the year, and there is nothing quite like the Memorial Day, July 4th, and Christmas festivities in this 1 square mile Village just 16 minutes to the City and the Airport. Just move in an smile you have found your new home!

title: Spacious Bi Level 3bed/3bath with Private Roof Deck
description: Welcome home to your beautifully crafted and spacious bi level 3 bed/ 3 bathroom unit located in the buzzing Kensington neighborhood of Philadelphia. The apartment features recessed lighting, central air & heat, hardwood floors, high ceilings, well appointed kitchen with stainless steel appliances and tile backsplash, modern bathrooms and an expansive roof deck perfect for entertaining or taking in the spring/summer days. The master suite has a walk in closet and en suite bathroom. Schedule your showing today! About The Neighborhood: You’ll be walking distance from the Huntingdon Station for the MFL, Temple University Hospital (Episcopal Campus), and convenient shops and eateries along Lehigh Ave, such as Calypso Bar, Noodle House, Fiore Pizza, Franny Lou’s Porch, and much more! Lease Terms: Generally, first month, last month, and one month security deposit due at, or prior to, lease signing. Other terms may be required by Landlord. $45 application fee per applicant. title: Come see this incredibly spacious townhome
description:
Come see this incredibly spacious townhome, nestled in a private courtyard! Located within the Meredith School Catchment in Queen Village, this home truly has everything you need from a private outdoor space, to garage parking to open concept living! Upon entering on the 1st floor landing, you will make your way up the stairs into the main living and dining area. The welcoming living area is open concept style and very spacious. The spacious kitchen is equipped with wood cabinetry, gorgeous countertops, stainless steel appliances, and a large breakfast bar area. The living space is filled with natural and recessed lighting and also includes a sliding back door which gives access to the back patio area great for grilling and entertaining! The rest of the space is filled with 3 incredibly spacious bedrooms with great closet space, lots of natural light, and high ceilings! Not to mention, the 3rd bedroom has an ensuite bathroom. There are a total of 2.5 bathrooms in this unit and all have their own special characteristics. The first full bathroom includes a modern vanity and a stall shower/tub combo! The 2nd full bathroom features an extra wide vanity countertop, a stall shower and separate soaking tub! The basement is home to the washer/dryer and this unit also features 1 car garage parking as well as 1 outdoor spot, directly outside the garage! Talk about convenience! Now let's talk location. This townhome is perfectly situated in the charming neighborhood of Queen Village where dining and shopping is all around. Check out local favorites like The Bagel Place, Red Hook Coffee and Tea, Cry Baby Pasta, Neighborhood Ramen and so many more! Take Front Street North to experience local neighborhoods like Society Hill, Head House Square, and Old City. Venture a couple blocks West to indulge in all E Passyunk Ave. has to offer! Easy transportation includes I-95 and local bus stops. Does this sound like your new home? If so, come by and see this amazing townhome for yourself by scheduling a showing today!

description: Enough now. A nicely updated contemporary style townhome in a quiet corner of Palo Alto College Terrace. Other fantastic features of this home include an updated bathroom, bright hardwood floors, central AC, indoor laundry and much more. Located near the excellent Palo Alto School and the vibrant California Ave district, where you can find plenty of shops, restaurants and a short walk from the year-round Sunday farmer's market. Near Town and Country Mall, Stanford Shopping Center and University Avenue.

title: Brand New Home for rent with Huge Yard!
description:
Do you love to entertain? Love outdoor space? Want to live in new construction? Want a finished basement? Look no further! This 3-bedroom home is 1,320 sq feet of amazing clean lines and sleek finishes. It will catch your eye within this cutting edge modern and completely renovated home in the heart of Olde Kensington. There is a Powder room & outdoor space on the first floor with 3 sizeable bedrooms as well as the primary which features and En Suite restroom & additional closet. There is also a private roof deck. No box is left unchecked in this home. This home is surrounded by beautiful new construction, walkable to hip/trendy restaurants and bars. Just a 5-minute Uber ride to Fishtown & 10 minutes to the city! All for a steal! Do not miss out :). Fenced rear yard and roof deck provide an abundance of outdoor space! Finished basement adds additional living space! Pet friendly pending landlord approval
Additional Neighborhood info.
Not to be confused with Northeast Philadelphia, North Philadelphia East encompasses the smaller subsets of Ludlow, Yorktown, West Kensington, Poplar, and Callowhill. This composite area runs from the Vine Street Expressway, stretching north to Erie Avenue. Broad Street acts as its eastern border, and the western edge runs a jagged line separating North Philadelphia East from the nearby Kensington, Port Richmond, and Fishtown neighborhoods. With such a long stretch of city, the neighborhood offers a diverse blend of important city landmarks, such as renowned musical venues the Electric Factory and Union Transfer, and Temple University, North Philadelphia's premiere site of higher learning.

We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. Contact a leasing agent to schedule a personal tour of our Haverford apartments.

title: Why Rent When You Can BUY!!!
description:
Many renters don't think they have enough money to buy a home, when in realty your paying around $1,500 a month for rent. You may be able to qualify for a mortgage and buy a home!
Owning a home has a lot more benefits then renting one of them being your monthly payment goes to something more valuable and you gain more equity in your home. When you are renting your money doesn't benefit you at all it is just making your landlord richer.
If you are considering purchasing a home please feel free to send me an email and I would be glad to help and walk you through the process.
Christy Smoot
Coldwell Banker Realty Conshohocken

title: Beautiful 3 bed 2 bath house in Filter Square, great location!
description:
515 S. 27th Street – Available August 1
This 4 story Fitler Square Home is a gem in the highly desired Fitler Square neighborhood. Perfectly situated a block away from the Schuylkill (Taney) Park and just at the foot of the South Street bridge leading to UPenn, CHOP, and Drexel. There is not a better location to enjoy all the benefits of Center City, with the accessibility to University City.
The home features an open concept layout, with exposed brick and beams, as well as the ample lighting provided by the overhead skylight which catches your eye as you walk through the front door into the living room. Pass through the dining room as you enter the kitchen which has been completely updated with Stainless steel appliances, granite counter tops, maple cabinets, glass /slate backsplash, and a porcelain tile floor with radiant heating below, finished with a convenient granite breakfast bar. Off of the kitchen is a quaint rear outdoor area, ideal for a grilling and relaxing on your patio table. The entire home has been updated with dark hand-scraped maple hardwood floors, custom trim work and neutral yet classic freshly painted walls.
Go up the open staircase to the 2nd floor, which boasts the master bedroom complete with recessed lighting, ceiling fan and his/her California-style closets, as well as an additional storage closet. As well, there is a newly remodeled custom bathroom with enclosed glass shower including porcelain floor and wall tile and stone/glass mosaic accent wall. The exposed brick wall follows you up to the third floor which features another remodeled bathroom with full tub, as well as a bedroom with brick fireplace and a 3rd nice sized bedroom.
Truly unique to this home for this area of the city is the 400+sf finished basement. Use this area as an entertainment area, child’s play room, or office. This room features recessed lighting, wall to wall sculpted carpeting, HDMI hook-up, flatscreen mount, built in entertainment shelving, enclosed laundry area, and ample storage.
Convenient to Rittenhouse Square, UPenn, CHOP, Drexel, Fitler Square park, Taney Park, Graduate Hospital, Philadelphia Airport, and of course all of the restaurants, coffee shops, bars and overall neighborhood feel which makes Fitler Square one of the City’s most desirable neighborhoods.
Due with signing of the lease: First month’s rent, last month’s rent, 1 month security deposit

Great location at the corner of N 22nd Street and Fairmount Ave in the middle of all the action.  This Beautiful and well laid out apartment not only has tons of space but an amazing location. title: This building is designed with modern touches and warm finishes.
description:
Phenomenal Flat-level 1 Bedroom in New Ultra-Modern Building Welcome to 1141 N Front Street! This building is designed with modern touches and warm finishes. It features great amenities including a shared common roof deck with center city views, a bike room, elevator, and parking. The building offers limited parking spots at an additional cost. This apartment is 1 bedroom / 1 bathroom. The apartment features vinyl flooring throughout the unit with large windows for natural lighting. The kitchen is complemented with a quartz countertop and a beautiful backsplash that blends in perfectly with the white cabinets and makes the kitchen look very modern and clean. There is plenty of cabinet space and all the appliances you can ask for inside a unit including a microwave and an in-unit washer and dryer.
